column2:
"You were awesome back there! That Tunnels
place is totally messed up, though. I thought we
were history for sure."
"I never expected to see a Mech that huge!"

"But I don't think that's why I was feeling weirded
out. It's like I have a feeling that something's gonna
happen, but I have no idea what."

"But I guess we got back in one piece, so all's
well that ends well, right?"

"Well, see ya, partner. I hope you'll be around
the next time I need you!"
